message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and the benefits it can bring to your life.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'd like to make a counteroffer. I'm willing to pay $750000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of similar products.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your concerns about the price, but I'm not willing to go as low as $750000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $825000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's unique features and the value it can bring to your life.

Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm still a bit hesitant to pay $825000. I'd like to make another counteroffer. I'm willing to pay $775000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of similar products and the value it can bring to my life.

I believe this is a fair price considering the product's unique features and the value it can bring to your life.

I believe this is a fair price considering the product's unique features and the value it can bring to your life.

Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession. However, I'm still not comfortable paying $810000. I've reached my limit and I'm willing to walk away if we can't come to an agreement. I'm willing to pay $800000 for the product. This is my final offer.
